verses.text: Naecnab'i, manh jantacoc swach'il schaan sb'a yaj heb' sk'ab' yoc sb'a ayic junnhej tz'aj spensar heb'.
Lajan yet' jun perfume manh jantacoc swach'il scot jililoc t'a sjolom winhaj sacerdote Aarón, tz'emul t'a xil sti' winh, tz'emk'och t'a spayual sjaj spichul winh.
Lajan wal icha yal ak'wal tz'em t'a sjolom lum witzal Hermón, tz'empax t'a lum tzalan Sion. Ha b'aj ay junk'olal chi', syak'b'at swach'k'olal Jehová, aton k 'inal t'a junelnhej.
